Gigas was waiting for Razorclaw's reaction, when...

Kracken: Unite! Haha!
=

Horn Drill ran to Gigas and leapt into the air, becoming an arm. Beholder =
2 ran to Gigas, and transformed into a leg, attaching onto Gigas. Kracken b=
ecomes an arm and jumps into the air, also. Grenade dives under Gigas, who =
was now raised into the air by Beholder 2, and attaches as a leg. Gigas spr=
outs a head and Horn Drill and Kracken attach to him. Mobster was formed. M=
obster, in place of where Gigas was, looks down at Razorclaw and laughs, hi=
s voice echoeing through the sky, loud and booming...
